text: Cunon ki ʙa pajomʙarone peş az tu vahj firistodem, hamcunin rūhe az amri Xudro (Qur'onro) ʙa farmoni Xud ʙa tu vahj kardem, ki sarcaşmai hajoti dilho ast. Tu ej Rasul, namedonistī kitoʙu imon cist. Vale Mo on Qur'onro nure soxtem, to har jak az ʙandagonamonro, ki ʙixohem, ʙa on hidojat kunem va haroina, tu mardumro ʙo in Qur'on ʙa rohi rost roh menamoī va on rohi Islom ast
